Key Match Events: Celtics went on a decisive 15-0 run in the fourth quarter
Tatum punctuated the rally with a trio of free throws
Pre-Game Insights: Boston was without guard Derrick White due to an illness
Denver was without reigning MVP Nikola Jokic and forward Aaron Gordon
Post-Match Reflections: Celtics coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Nuggets couldn't overcome a 15-point lead that vanished in the first half
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was tied at 88-88 early in the fourth quarter
Boston ended the game with a 15-point lead
